publicwhip.spmotion: * S3M-6184 Mary Scanlon: Congratulations to Walkers Shortbread—That the Parliament congratulates Walkers Shortbread on receiving the Queen’s Award for Enterprise for International Trade; notes that sales have grown steadily over the years with approximately 40% of the company’s products being exported to more than 80 overseas markets; commends the family traditions of the company with the business now run by third and fourth generations of the Walker family and employing well over 1,000 people; further notes that it is believed that Walkers is the first UK food manufacturer to have won this prestigious award four times, and wishes the company continued success in the future making shortbread and other Scottish specialities from its base in Aberlour to markets around the world. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
